description: Daz is a Pokémon Merchant who captures Pokémon from various regions for Pokémon Collectors all over the world and sell them out on a large scale on the Internet. Daz places transmitting devices on his captured Pokémon so he can follow them if they escape. With help from Ash, Officer Jenny managed to arrest Daz and they let all the captured Pokémon go.
name: Daz
